name: Super Shadow Ybrik
description:
Become one with the shadows and slide up the wall as everyone's favourite round boi Ybrik! (very different from Kirby).

(This is not the complete version so there may be a few bugs and graphical errors)

Controls:    
          Movement: Arrow keys
          Morph: SPACE

Credits:

Music: 

Mysterious Cavern by AlexDer:
https://alexder.itch.io/modern-game-soundtracks-loop

This was perfect thankyou Alex!
